    pfs=""
>
[Phantom Shroud](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1783)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #185: A Taste of Ashes](/Sources.aspx?ID=188) pg. 78</row>

**Price** 15,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cloak

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This pale blue cloak is wispy, thin, and cold to the touch. When worn, the cloak turns your hands pale and translucent, imbuing you with the dangerous touch of a [ghost](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=51). This effect doesn't impede the normal use of your hands. You also gain an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack that deals 3d6 negative damage with the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), and [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) traits. You gain the benefits of a [_+2 weapon potency_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=281) rune with these unarmed attacks (granting a +2 item bonus to your attack rolls).
